channel.title: RainbowScape 317 delta development team
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://rainbowscape.herobo.com/images/banner.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=24pt]Hello Guys![/size]
Things u wil need: -DROPBOX -TEAMVIEWER
Website/forums Coders: Jesse
Our current owners are : Erik,Axel and Michael
Server Coders are : Erik
Client Coders are : None..
Hoster is: Michael
[/center] [center][b][u]Delta based server.[/u][/b][/center]
[center][size=12pt] We need : 1,website coder 2,server coder 3,client coder[/size][/center] [center]
[b]Original to PROJECT RAINBOW:[/b]
Pyramid of Zen - a fun pvp minigame Skeletons - get points by killing a variety of skeletons! Perfect custom made ::afk system (unique and not gay like the rest) Email system (records email, fool proof (at least for the first time :P)) Unnull system (owners can load players' backup files) Token shop (2 bil tax bags = 2 billion coins) Rainbow points system for many boss npc kills XHP (unlimited hp for all, owners can turn it on, players can turn it off for themselves) ::save and ::backup to ensure that you are never nulled Working restart via command, playersaves work Perfect IPlogs with proper date, very useful Tradelogs, yelllogs, pmlogs working perfectly Unsafepk - The only place where you lose stuff PVP Drops system (custom made) PVP point shops Lottery system SYI proof without limiting one IP per person (long playernames, GF :D) View bans, ipbans, banlogs, iplogs via command! Master password system, works PERFECT Custom yell colors (eg, purple, dark green, gray) Toggleyell so regular players cannot yell Impersonate (fake yells for any name, via the getYellTitle method) PCbans (stores file on pc, unfinished!) Command listener, sees what every player types! :) Debug system (sendquest id's, technical stuff, etc) Forcedialog (npc dialog pops up, custom message!) Forcetalk (they say something you input) Special yell that only staff members can see Owners can open players websites NPCreset does not affect jad anymore Rep++ and Rep-- system once a day MOST DUPES ARE PATCHED (drop dupe, accept decline dupe, trade yourself dupe, etc, etc) The flower game (random mithril seeds) Claws spec works PKban system PERFECT Tempban system PERFECT Mute and IP mute system PERFECT Jail and IP jail system PERFECT PRC system, owners can private tele players, even staffs cannot interrupt them! Only players on a rights list can ban, mute, promote, demote, restart, etc Swap system (swap coords with a player) Get item name via id! Working energy replenish Forget system (uses a for loop to pickup mass amounts of consecutive items) Save Account PK trading is GONE FOREVER Autologin (we like player count) Random chat FX, but you can change it too! MySQL for some of the logs (note: database not included in release currently) Fake IP system, good for fooling around with retarded staff members Chemistry for poisoning enemies, mix chemicals around! Mac address banning system Custom login protocol - stops most cheat clients Shadow chat effects (which is normally only seen in stupid PI clients) Vote rewards (still needs MySql dB) Custom items... :O [/center] [center]
[b]Original Customs[/b]
Rainbow Claws Dark Weapons Holy Weapons Berserk Armor Sailor Suit Angry Dog Shield Phoenix GS God Whips Royal Cape Evil Weapons Death Assassin Multicolored Sabres Liquid Spear Dual Ice Swords Golden Weapons Silver Broadsword Dark Ice Weapons Christmas Weapons Crimson Blade Keyblade PHOTON WEAPONS (they rrrock!) Halogen Blades BainBlades CaoNiMa SSBB Hammer SSBB Golden Hammer Rainbow Scarf Pitchfork Chemicals Elemental Broadswords Honeypots Angry Birds Fender Stratocaster Gibson Les Paul Hammond Organ Cooking pot helms (think Veggie Tales) A million swords (too many to list, for penguins) And then the recolors..[/center] [b] Pictures: [/b]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/3ZsQs.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/0Ny01.png[/img] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2r7t5kh.jpg[/img]
[center]Website coder[/center]
[center] [code] Name: Age: Website development experience 1/10: What sites have you developed(PHP,HTML, HTML): MSN/Skype:[/code][/center]
[center]Client coder[/center] [center] [code] Age: Name Java Experience 1/10: Total time using Java: MSN/Skype:[/code][/center]
[center]Server coder[/center]
[center][code]Name: Age: Java Experience 1/10: Time Using Java: Msn: Previous Work:[/code][/center]
We use the project rainbow source: for more info about this source go to this topic [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,538820.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,538820.0.html[/url]
Server Credits:
40% Deltascape Source 20% Whac (Justin) 20% Salthesexy (Sal) 10% Viper Bot (Martin) 10% Other (tutorials back in '11)
Client Credits:
65% Jagex 10% Whac 2% Racecar 2% Im Hunter 2% Blackstar 2% Mikegau44 2% Fyrus Blane 15% Other (other modellers, client tutorials back in '11, etc)
[size=14pt]We Update The Topic Almost Evry Hour[/size]

item.title: RainbowScape 317 delta development team
item.dc:creator: @MareInTheMoon MareInTheMoon
item.description:
@MareInTheMoon wrote:

If you do make a new Ritzscape, you’ll need to fix those dupes. lol

Read full topic

item.title: RainbowScape 317 delta development team
item.dc:creator: @king_rauddys2 king_rauddys
item.description:
@king_rauddys2 wrote:

[quote=“Mopar Coder, post:45, topic:436557”][quote author=whackatre link=topic=539270.msg3950214#msg3950214 date=1332216030]

Custums are now dead, sorry.
[/quote]Customs aren’t dead, I’ve enjoyed them ever since Ritzscape.

Got to admit, i loved ritzscape, best server even thought is was custom, is it still on?

Ritzscape is dead and has been dead for a long time. There was a short revival last year in which I was actually promoted to owner (yeah, legitimate Ritz), but it shut down quickly due to corruption, and this is getting far too off-topic.

Thanks for the info, interested into starting a remake of it with me?

I don’t have that much time to work on a project other than my own. But if you are interested, you should talk to one of the original owners. It isn’t really legit unless you have one of the founders on your team (Ssolidd, King Rauddys).

Maybe, just alitte king said hes much older before he quit and he’s busy irl, so i quess i have to just make a remake and buy a domain, code it they didn’t add much anyways.[/quote]

mopar, i would really appriciate a remade version of ritzscape.

if you need help tell me.

-Rauddys.

Read full topic

item.title: RainbowScape 317 delta development team
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“the king erik, post:52, topic:436557”][quote author=Owner Zack of PwnageScape link=topic=539270.msg3951046#msg3951046 date=1332281833]
L0l, I don’t think he can be creative.
How is it a development “team” if all he’s going to do is steal credits?
[/quote]

We are Not stealing credits… Look at the topic’s bottom ;)[/quote]

Look below.

Original to Rainbow Scape:

Pyramid of Zen - a fun pvp minigame
Skeletons - get points by killing a variety of skeletons!
Perfect custom made ::afk system (unique and not gay like the rest)
Email system (records email, fool proof (at least for the first time ))
Unnull system (owners can load players’ backup files)

That’s NOT original to “RainbowScape”. In other words, you didn’t create that, it’s not yours. I don’t care if you credit Sal and I for everything. I will say this very bluntly, stop claiming that you made that. You might as well rename it to, “Features our source already has:”.

Read full topic

item.title: RainbowScape 317 delta development team
item.dc:creator: @the_king_erik the king erik
item.description:
@the_king_erik wrote:

MareInTheMoon:

Customs make a server unique. Project Rainbow was not meant to be a copy of RS (although they used the base). Think of customs as a way to make your server more like yourself. As to give it a personal-feel, to make it feel more like a home than a game.

okay first of all NO-ONE can make a server that everyone likes. pls stop hating this source and stop commenting if u dont like it etc.

we are looking for developer team (still needed 2 server coders 1or 2 client coders…) and not for horrible hate comments.
We love customs and if u dont want to accept it dont even play it…

We are happy about every help we can get becuz developing a RSPS with 2 players is actually IMPOSSIBLE

IF U READ THIS U ACCEPT YOU DONT POST ANY HATE COMMENTS ETC.

Read full topic

item.title: RainbowScape 317 delta development team
item.dc:creator: @MareInTheMoon MareInTheMoon

Customs make a server unique. Project Rainbow was not meant to be a copy of RS (although they used the base). Think of customs as a way to make your server more like yourself. As to give it a personal-feel, to make it feel more like a home than a game.

Read full topic

item.title: RainbowScape 317 delta development team
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Guys, it’s plural, wasn’t talking to you in specific. Nor was I about most of this. Seeing as you haven’t done much trolling as you have imputed constructive criticism. It’s acceptable to question why they added so many customs. Or why they used the revision they did when all they want to do is use stuff from newer revisions. But to completely say “I hate all customs” is a little harsh. And hey, the tanks on this server are fun to kill.

Read full topic

item.title: RainbowScape 317 delta development team
item.dc:creator: @Djayboi6 Dj_
item.description:
@Djayboi6 wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:31, topic:436557”][quote author=Dj_ link=topic=539270.msg3949031#msg3949031 date=1332119870]
Or people adding in there criticism… constructive or not. Get over yourself, its not YOUR thread and move on with your day. Your argument is invalid, have a nice day.
[/quote]

My argument is completely valid seeing I’m a part of this development team. Constructive criticism is fine. This:

Coders

*Programmer’s.
Besides that, too many customs. a lot’s already been done to the source already, client looks hideous. must i continue?

Edit: Props to you for a ‘decent’ looking thread.

customs are cool. NO
it can be much more done to the server, Indeed, removing customs
client looks good. NO
no u dont have to continue hi

How ever, isn’t Constructive criticism.

Every single person I’ve ever seen make a dev team that has a client with customs gets dogged on for em.

That’s called trolling.

Let me bring you all up to speed. When you use a 317 client, and have 508 maps and items, those are customs. So when you say “customs suck” that instantly makes 95% of 317 client/servers suck
Get a life guys.[/quote]
for one, i hate anything past the revision of 474. and second of all, some customs are fine but 700+? That’s awful. and i will dog on anyone who use’s customs. And telling me to get a life? you’re also doing the same thing i am sitting behind a computer and arguing so you’re not any better.

Read full topic

it can be much more done to the server, Indeed, removing customs
client looks good. NO
no u dont have to continue hi
[/quote][/quote]
How ever, isn’t Constructive criticism.

Every single person I’ve ever seen make a dev team that has a client with customs gets dogged on for em.

That’s called trolling.

Let me bring you all up to speed. When you use a 317 client, and have 508 maps and items, those are customs. So when you say “customs suck” that instantly makes 95% of 317 client/servers suck
Get a life guys.

Read full topic
